description:
Fire up the grill, mix your marinades, become a chef and start your very own Cook-Off now!

Virtual Families Cook Off combines time management with home renovation and decoration! Serve your family and the whole neighborhood! Cook, grill and bake your way to becoming a master chef! Spend your hard-earned coins on customizing your home and raising the property value!

Fun and Challenging Levels!

Cook gourmet meals for your guests! Every level offers you a chance to expand your cooking techniques. Learn new recipes while you perfect your cooking strategy, serving great food fast! Challenge yourself to make as many dishes as possible in timed levels, replay old ones, and serve customers from your backyard!

Decorate and renovate your home!

Give your family home a complete makeover - renovate and decorate different houses, restaurants and so much more! Then, move onto the next project! The options are endless for your virtual home, with plenty of customization options - you’ll never get bored!

Fun foods from around the world!

Cook Off meals are deliciously diverse! Learn about new foods from Hong Kong to Boston and everywhere in between!

Upgrade dishes and kitchen gear!

Upgrade your food to make more money - customers pay more the more savory your ingredients! Update your kitchen gear, increasing capacity and decreasing cooking time - you’d hate to keep even a single guest waiting! Every item in this fantastic game can be upgraded, giving you a sense of accomplishment as you go from backyard BBQ to five-star chef!
name: Virtual Families Cook Off: Chapter 2 Farm Life
